Oasis Albums

Heathen Chemistry (2002)

Album Statistics

  • Release Date: July 1, 2002
  • UK Chart Position: #1
  • First Week Sales: 270,000 copies
  • Total Sales: Over 3.4 million copies worldwide
  • Certification: 2× Platinum (UK)

Key Tracks

  • The Hindu Times
  • Stop Crying Your Heart Out
  • Little By Little
  • Songbird

Songwriting Credits

The first Oasis album to feature songwriting contributions from all band members, including Liam Gallagher's first solo composition "Songbird".

Don't Believe the Truth (2005)

Album Statistics

  • Release Date: May 30, 2005
  • UK Chart Position: #1
  • First Week Sales: 237,000 copies
  • Total Sales: Over 7 million copies worldwide
  • Certification: 2× Platinum (UK)

Key Tracks

  • Lyla
  • The Importance of Being Idle
  • Let There Be Love
  • Turn Up the Sun

Critical Reception

Widely considered their strongest album since Be Here Now, receiving positive reviews for its more collaborative approach and return to form.
